author: Dmitry Stashenko
title: AdaStat.net Platform Upgrade
description: The upcoming changes in the Cardano will bring a lot of new features, support for which is not implemented in existing blockchain explorers

assessments.note: having multiple blockchain explorers which compete between themselves is really important.
The proposal of upgrading an already fonctional blockchain explorer for the incoming features and change of Cardano is totally up for the challenge
Considering some community explorers already has this features, this might be duplicate for funding from cardano
this is not furthering the dev ecosystem at all
the proposer team already have presence in the cardano community. if they can do it in past than have no doubts that they will do it in future as well.
The proposer have already shown his skill and motivation by his previous work on adastat.net and adastatbot. but the plan to include new features lack of details.
There is high chances the this proposal will be implemented as they already have team which has done work in this domain.
there is no budget, technical detail, implementation metrics or other info to assert how this will increase Cardano's dev ecosystem
if the deliverables were mention along with the timeline than the proposal would have been perfect.
The feasabilty has already been demonstrated by the previous work done on the product. But the roadmap is unclear so the  efficiency is dificult to assess.
Some features like assets, smart contracts will be helpful for the developer ecosystem apart from what they already have.
This proposal is lacking a lot of basic information on top of not addressing the dev ecosystem challenge at all.

solution: Our platform will implement support for native tokens, smart contracts, and all other new features in the Cardano blockchain
experience: Dmitry Stashenko - creator of adastat.net and https://t.me/AdaStatBot, computer science degree, 12 years of web-development
